Reviews.Title: “Happy with our stay”
Reviews.Author: Samtoh
Reviews.Content: nola easter weekend 2010 chose hampton inn carondelet base stayed 2 nights pleased choice hotel spacious king bed comfy liked microwave mini fridge internet complimentary didnt bathroom didnt bath tub bath amenities basic hotel offers daily complimentary breakfast 6am 10am fussy eaters food adequate choice breakfast cereals sweet breads waffle station fresh fruit yogurt hot food station fruit juice tea coffee breakfast spacious comfortable theres flat tv hotels computer located note tea coffee served day breakfast hotel safe location 5 minute walk french quarter cvs store corner carondelet canal handy snacks drinks st charles streetcar goes pass front hotel overall fairly happy stay stay providing rates stay competative

Reviews.Title: “Great service, good location, dated rooms.”
Reviews.Author: vagardener
Reviews.Content: stayed hampton inn french quarter week vacation hotel conveniently located block half french quarter easy walking distance quieter street service outstanding arrived walked discovered window directly couple feet onto building dark dreary called front desk immediately offered larger light front building staff helpful unfortunately queens instead king beware told standard king windows facing building free wifi included breakfast nice perks theres free computerprinter breakfast handy morning wasnt front desk manager personal laptop print voucher manager called happy stay downside bathrooms guess hotel hasnt remodeled converted hampton inn mid 90s ok youre looking affordable option near french quarter service choice

Reviews.Title: “NCAA basketball visit”

Reviews.Content: spent 4 nights hampton ncaa basketball hotel couple blocks canal street located st charles trolley line building originally designed famed architect daniel burnham converted hotel 90s tend spacious staff friendly efficient breakfast bar offered couple hot items typically offered hampton locations food served island wall design bit efficient shape signs wear carpet public spaces security swipe card access elevator

Reviews.Content: picked hotel location ncaa tourney games orleans arena 1520min walk bourbon st 1 block hotel didnt disapoint buddy stayed 3 nights pretty basic tv fridge microwave coffeemaker windows equally little tough dark morning deal bathroom little dated fine overall orleans deal stay tell friends stay travels
